title: Forkchoice in devnet
body:
Hi everyone,

I have two nodes in my local devnet with custom genesis file, where I am running geth and prysm in each node.

Initially there was only 1 node, let's say Node-A. After some time I added Node-B and tried to extend the network. The CL in that node tries to import blocks from other node and optimitiscally update the head chain. It calls geth with fork choice and geth is stuck on  **Forkchoice requested sync to new head.**



INFO [08-02|20:12:22.967] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=116 hash=1ec866..c63941 finalized=104
INFO [08-02|20:12:34.864] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=117 hash=96d591..c447ef finalized=104

Do you have any Idea what could be the problem ?.
